title: How to Make a Computer Diary

steps.title: Open Microsoft Word.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Word.

steps.title: Click 'Tools' then 'Options'.
steps.content: Click 'Tools' then 'Options'. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Choose 'Security'.
steps.content: Choose 'Security'.

steps.title: Type your password in both boxes, then click 'Ok.'
steps.content: Type your password in both boxes, then click 'Ok.'

steps.title: Use this Word Document as your computer diary.
steps.content: Use this Word Document as your computer diary. If you want more security, then follow the steps below.

steps.title: Decorate your new diary with pictures and whatever else you want to use.
steps.content: Decorate your new diary with pictures and whatever else you want to use.

steps.title: Type your entries, then change the font to something like 'wingdings' (or change the font color to white) and that way, even if someone guessed the password, they wouldn't be able to read it unless they changed the font.
steps.content: Type your entries, then change the font to something like 'wingdings' (or change the font color to white) and that way, even if someone guessed the password, they wouldn't be able to read it unless they changed the font.

steps.title: After a year or two, you might like to protect yourself from a computer hacker or annoying sisters and brothers to stop trying to hack your computer diary files.
steps.content: After a year or two, you might like to protect yourself from a computer hacker or annoying sisters and brothers to stop trying to hack your computer diary files. Read how to make a password protected file as mentioned in the tips, but this time even more security.

steps.title: Search for 'My Journal ' and download the free 'My Journal 1' program.
steps.content: Search for 'My Journal ' and download the free 'My Journal 1' program. Or, download it directly from this location: https://download.cnet.com/my-journal/3000-2124_4-10571501.html , and click the blue Download Now hyperlink.

steps.title: Following the provided steps after downloading, the software choose a password and username you can remember.

steps.title: If somebody comes in the room while you're typing an entry, hit the 'Esc' button on your keyboard and the program will save where you are and log out immediately.
steps.content: If somebody comes in the room while you're typing an entry, hit the 'Esc' button on your keyboard and the program will save where you are and log out immediately.

steps.title: Create a new folder on your desktop.
steps.content: Create a new folder on your desktop.

steps.title: Add some normal files (like ordinary documents) inside the folder.
steps.content: Add some normal files (like ordinary documents) inside the folder.

steps.content: Write your diary text in a Word Document inside your regular folder, but outside your zipped one.

steps.title: Drag your diary text into the zipped folder.

steps.title: Now, whenever you access the folder with a password, you can click on your diary file and type away!

steps.title: To doodle, just press the command button and D.
steps.content: To doodle, just press the command button and D. Press insert if you want to.

steps.title: When someone enters the room when you're in the middle of writing an entry, you can press command and H to hide it.
steps.content: When someone enters the room when you're in the middle of writing an entry, you can press command and H to hide it. You can also press the close button so it will save too. [4] X Research source
